mapper.insert: insert into member values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{address}, default, default, default, default)
mapper.select: select id_type, board_title, modify_date, count_content from (select board_id id_type, board_title, board_modify_date modify_date, to_char(board_count) count_content from board where board_writer= #{id} and board_status='Y' order by board_id desc) where rownum<6 union select * from (select board_type-3, board_title, reply_modify_date, reply_content from reply join board on (board_id=ref_board_id) where reply_writer = #{id} and reply_status='Y' order by reply_id desc) where rownum<6 order by id_type desc
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, nickname=#{nickName}, email=#{email}, gender=#{gender}, age=#{age}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, update_date= sysdate where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from todo_list where writer = #{id} order by todo_num
mapper.insert: insert into todo_list values(seq_lid.nextval, #{todo}, #{writer}, default, default)
